name: Easy Custom Post Type Maker
author: Clean to Shine

sections.description:
Easy Custom Post Type Maker is the perfect plugin to create Custom Post Types and custom Taxonomies using admin panel.

Originally by Clean to Shine.

Our Services as below:

  • Clean to Shine Cleaning Services
  • End Of Lease Cleaning Melbourne
  • Vacate Cleaning Melbourne
  • Move out Cleaning Melbourne
  • End Of Lease Cleaning Melbourne Packages
  • End Of Lease Cleaning Adelaide

Features

  • Plugin allows you to create Custom Post Types and custom Taxonomies without the need of writing any code.
  • Plugin also allows you to manage the Easy Custom Post Type icon.
sections.installation:
1. Upload ‘easy-custom-post-type-maker’ to the ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Click the new menu item ‘Easy Post Types’ to create a Custom Post Type or a custom Taxonomy
sections.changelog:
1.0.0

  • [Added] Ability to select DashIcons as Custom Post Type icon.
  • [Bugfix] Fixed add_utility_page provokes "deprecated" notice in 4.5.2
  • [Forked] Forked https://wordpress.org/plugins/custom-post-type-maker/
